title: Blended Training Course for Strengthening Basic Cardiac POCUS Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and understanding of ultrasound examination principles
context.additional_context: Large-scale personalized education for learners conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: The basic principles and clinical applications of cardiac POCUS can be explained.
Standard four-view cardiac structures can be obtained using a portable ultrasound device.
Cardiac dysfunction can be identified with 80% or higher accuracy through POCUS image analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
